lbms.plugins.mldht.kad.tasks

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • lbms.plugins.mldht.kad.tasks.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Task>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KeyspaceCrawler, KeyspaceSampler, PingRefreshTask, TargetedTask

    public abstract class Task
extends Object
implements Comparable<Task>
    Performs a task on K nodes provided by a KClosestNodesSearch. This is a base class for all tasks.
    Author:
    Damokles
